name: HH_EPS_NY_INFO
description: Extracts information about NY Medicaid Episodic Payment System (EPS) from Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) data sets where Medicaid is a payor.

columns.name: OASIS_SET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EPS_GROUPER_CODE
columns.description: Stores the NY Medicaid EPS Grouper Code as calculated from OASIS data. This grouper code is analogous to the OASIS HHRG.

columns.name: EPS_RATE_CODE
columns.description: Stores the NY Medicaid EPS Rate Code as calculated from OASIS data. This rate code is analogous to an OASIS HIPPS code.
